resources.string: Password needs to be at least 8 characters.
Take it easy! Everything is going to be fine. It\'s just a phase you\'re passing through.\n\nLet\'s see how we can help?
Here are some friends that are willing to help!

We made this application to help people in need because we know how it feels. We want to make progress in the field of mutual help since not all of us are even aware of the fact that there are people like us out there that can really help us.

While this application tries to offer the best help for you from people out there please do understand that this is on the basis of volounteering and thus we do not take any responsibility for any negative outcome of the conversation. All the best!

Registering as a Helper means that you will be marked to help others 24/7. You can later change this setting in the application but have in mind that some people, seeing you listed as helper might be hoping that you will help them.\n\nAre you sure you want to be a helper?
Hi there! How can I help you?
Someone is sending you a message!
A friend sent you message. Be kind with him and see what you can do.
You can start using the app now.
Currently there are no users to help you. Take some of the other methods of help!
Do you really want to signout?
This will end the current chat session without the possibility to recover it.\n\nAre you sure you want to end it?
Look at the center of the color for a while. Best done with headset on.
